title: ‘He is Like Tom Boonen:’ Is Fast French Phenom Paul Magnier Quick-Step’s Next Cobble King?
content:
Paul Magnier is creating a buzz inside the 'Wolfpack' with his fast finishing kick and big engine. Sound familiar? He'll be headlining at Omloop.

Read the full article at ‘He is Like Tom Boonen:’ Is Fast French Phenom Paul Magnier Quick-Step’s Next Cobble King? on Velo.
author: ahood
